author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: pure javascript version of https://www.npmjs.com/package/mongodb with zero npm dependencies
name: mongodb-minimal

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p node_modules && printf "module.exports = require('../bson')" > node_modules/bson.js && printf "module.exports = require('../mongodb')" > node_modules/mongodb.js && printf "module.exports = require('../mongodb-core')" > node_modules/mongodb-core.js
